question: The Balance Sheet
answer: The Balance Sheet is a summary of the assets and liabilities and equity of a business at a specific point of time.

question: Income Statement
answer: The Income (Profit and Loss) Statement, commonly referred to as the P&L statement, summarizes the revenue and expenses for a specific time period (one month, one quarter, one year, etc.).

question: Financial Plan
answer: Keep your information current and review the documents on a regular basis (monthly or more often if needed). Review them with key individuals within your company.

question: Financial Ratios
answer: Ratios are useful when comparing your company with the competition on financial performance and also when benchmarking the performance of your company.
